attributes.action: Get us back into the eu!!
attributes.additional_details: We wont survive on our own ! We be better off staying in
attributes.background: I want parliament to Reconsider and let us back into the eu as some votes were forged and shouldn't of been done in pencil so that it could be rubbed out! We should stay because the pound,nhs,Passports and  driving liscences will have 2 be changed Trade will be hit more unemployment do we want this?
